name: Talking Rhino Hero And Junior
description:
Meet the talking Rhino. Rhino is a very gentle rhinoceros that loves to make new friends and to play with them. He responds to your touch and repeats everything you say with his funny voice. He loves to make grimaces and to dance. There are also a lot of exciting games spread around the jungle and he cannot wait to play them with you!
Spend some time with Rhino and enjoy the time. He will show you some cool moves, his passion for music and all his favorite games.

★★★ Features: ★★★
✔ High quality 3D graphics
✔ The Rhinoceros repeats everything you say with a funny voice
✔ Exciting touch games with many levels like basketball flick, unblock puzzle, match- 3, racing etc.
✔ Many different animations
✔ Amazing soundboard with many funny sentences, sounds from animals, guns etc.
✔ Big fun for teenagers and adults of all ages

Talking Rhino Hero And Junior is a free application. Download Talking Rhino Hero And Junior now and please rate it with 5 stars if you like it.
